sentences: Matkis andekalt minu häält ja kõnemaneeri – täiesti minulik tuli välja.
See on väga minulik käitumine tema kohta.
Järgmine minulik samm oleks koguda vajalikud dokumendid.
context: The word 'minule' appears to be related to the adjective form shown in the dictionary definition. Based on the context provided, it seems to mean something that is characteristic or typical of me/my behavior/style. The example sentence shows someone imitating my voice and speech mannerisms perfectly - something very minulik came out, meaning it was very characteristic of how I speak.
